DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : Early advance idiopathic Parkinson 's disease Male female patient 18 year age Indication treatment pramipexole ER accord Summary Product Characteristics ( SmPC ) Exclusion criterion : Ongoing treatment pramipexole ER Exclusion criterion line pramipexole ER SmPC : In particular hypersensitivity pramipexole excipients pregnancy lactation state SmPC .
